node.name: partial-lock
node.description: A NETCONF operation that locks parts of the running datastore.None

node.name: select
node.description: XPath expression that specifies the scope of the lock. An Instance Identifier expression MUST be used unless the :xpath capability is supported, in which case any XPath 1.0 expression is allowed.None

node.name: lock-id
node.description: Identifies the lock, if granted. The lock-id SHOULD be used in the partial-unlock rpc.None

node.name: locked-node
node.description: List of locked nodes in the running datastoreNone

node.name: partial-unlock
node.description: A NETCONF operation that releases a previously acquired partial-lock.None

node.name: lock-id
node.description: Identifies the lock to be released. MUST be the value received in the response to a partial-lock operation.None
